name: judges
description: Simple webscrapper plus SPA site for visualisation public information about judges of Ukraine.

scripts.deploy: (cd ui && npm run build) && (cd scraper && npm run scrap:precached) && npm run push-to-gh-pages
scripts.copy-static: copyfiles .nojekyll CNAME robots.txt ./dist/ && echo 'Static files copied.'
scripts.copy-json: copyfiles source/*.json declarations/*.json ./dist/ && echo 'JSON files copied.'
scripts.build: (cd ui && npm run build) && npm run copy-static && npm run copy-json
